headline: Elizabeth Wurtzel and a Vanishing Dream
abstract: “Prozac Nation” seemed to herald a boundless future for young creatives. It was actually the beginning of the end.
lead_paragraph: A few years ago I got an email from Elizabeth Wurtzel telling me that her cancer had returned, and that it was advanced. Saying I was sorry would render precisely the wrong response, she let me know. Her illness didn’t scare her.
